Seasonal variations repeat at regular intervals.
Cyclical variations are longer term waves (e.g. economic cycle).
Random variations are unpredictable.
Additive model: Y = T + S + C + R.
Multiplicative model: Y = T x S x C x R.

Non-executive directors (NEDs) provide independent oversight.
Remuneration committees should be comprised of NEDs.

Lean systems focus on flow.
Kaizen encourages 'bottom-up' improvement ideas.

Business Process Re-engineering is fundamental rethinking.
Information systems can be a source of competitive advantage.
Big Data can lead to better customer segmentation.
Privacy concerns are a barrier to Big Data adoption.
Cybersecurity should be a board-level issue.

Ransomware locks data until a fee is paid.
Blockchain removes the need for a central intermediary.
Smart contracts are self-executing.
Fintech challenges traditional banking models.
Cryptocurrencies are often volatile.
Artificial Intelligence involves machines learning from data.
Machine Learning is a subset of AI.
Robotic Process Automation is best for high-volume, rule-based tasks.
Strategic planning is a one-time event.
Strategy implementation is often harder than formulation.
Performance measurement should encourage goal congruence.
